Package gui

Class LecturerStaticsReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.AbstractController
      • gui.LecturerStaticsReportController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SceneSetter
    public class LecturerStaticsReportController
extends AbstractController
    Controller class for the Lecturer Statistics Report screen. Generates statistics reports for lecturers, students, and courses. Displays the average and median grades in a BarChart. Calculates and displays the distribution of grades. Handles data retrieval from the database and populates the BarChart. Supports different types of reports based on the chosen report type. Supports generating reports for lecturers, students, and courses.
    Author:
    Mor Shmuel

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        protected void initialize()
        Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. Calculates the average, median, and grade distribution based on the selected report type and the retrieved data. Populates the BarChart with the calculated data.
